news_header: Harri Hursti, an election security consultant, discusses election fraud suspicions and the integrity of the 2020 election results.
news_text: Harri Hursti, known for his work in election security, has been consulting for nearly 20 years and gained attention for exposing vulnerabilities in voting machines. In a recent interview, he reflected on the 2020 election in Georgia, predicting that Donald Trump would question the results if he lost. Hursti has investigated claims of election fraud but found no evidence that would change the outcome of the election. He emphasizes the complexity of election audits and the importance of safeguarding democracy, warning that it can be lost quickly if not properly maintained.
